      • detection

        public LossData detection​(Vect3 s,
                          Vect3 vo,
                          Vect3 vi,
                          double D,
                          double H,
                          double B,
                          double T)
        Computes the conflict time interval in [B,T].
        Parameters:
        s - the relative position of the aircraft
        vo - the ownship's velocity
        vi - the intruder's velocity
        D - the minimum horizontal distance
        H - the minimum vertical distance
        B - the the lower bound of the lookahead time (B >= 0)
        T - the upper bound of the lookahead time (B < T)
        Returns:
        true, if the conflict time interval (t_in,t_out) is in [B,T].

      • detection

        public LossData detection​(Vect3 s,
                          Vect3 vo,
                          Vect3 vi,
                          double D,
                          double H,
                          double T)
        Computes the conflict time interval in [0,T].
        Parameters:
        s - the relative position of the aircraft
        vo - the ownship's velocity
        vi - the intruder's velocity
        D - the minimum horizontal distance
        H - the minimum vertical distance
        T - the the lookahead time (T > 0)
        Returns:
        true, if the conflict time interval (t_in,t_out) is in [0,T].

      • conflictDetection

        public ConflictData conflictDetection​(Vect3 so,
                                      Velocity vo,
                                      Vect3 si,
                                      Velocity vi,
                                      double B,
                                      double T)
        Description copied from class: Detection3D
        This functional call returns a ConflictData object detailing the conflict between times B and T from now (relative), if any.
        Specified by:
        conflictDetection in class Detection3D
        Parameters:
        so - ownship position
        vo - ownship velocity
        si - intruder position
        vi - intruder velocity
        B - beginning of detection time (>= 0)
        T - end of detection time (if T < 0 then use an "infinite" lookahead time)
        Returns:
        a ConflictData object detailing the conflict

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(Detection3D det)
        Description copied from class: Detection3D
        Return true if this instance is guaranteed to contain the entire volume for detector cd, given the same state values. In general, if cd is of a different type than this object, this method returns false. This should be a reflexive and transitive relation.
        Specified by:
        contains in class Detection3D
        Returns:

      • horizontalHazardZone

        public void horizontalHazardZone​(java.util.List<Position> haz,
                                 TrafficState ownship,
                                 TrafficState intruder,
                                 double T)
        Description copied from class: Detection3D
        Return a list of points (polygon) that approximates the horizontal hazard zone around the ownship, with respect to a traffic aircraft. A polygon is a list of points in counter-clockwise direction, where the last point is connected to the first one.
        Overrides:
        horizontalHazardZone in class Detection3D
        T - This time represents a time horizon in seconds. When T is 0, the polygon represents the hazard zone. Otherwise, the are represents the hazard zone with time horizon T. NOTE 1: This polygon should only be used for display purposes since it's merely an approximation of the actual hazard zone defined by the violation and detection methods. NOTE 2: This method has to be redefined as appropriate for every specific hazard zone.
